m_szDocTitle: Latin American Herald Tribune - Cactus-Inspired Membrane to Revolutionize Electric Cars
m_szDocSumamry: Cactus-Inspired Membrane to Revolutionize Electric Cars SYDNEY, Australia - A newly-developed membrane, based on the characteristics of a cactus plant, can improve the performance of fuel cells and revolutionize the electric cars industry, according to a study published Thursday. The membrane, developed by scientists from the Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation, or CSIRO, and South Korean Hanyang University, can improve fuel cell efficiency by four times. Aaron Thornton, CSIRO expert and co-author of the study published in the scientific journal Nature, says the coatin
